Description:
Should have a bachelor's degree (or equivalent) in Electronics or electrical.
Good verbal & written communication in English; Communication skill in Arabic in added advantage.
Good technical knowledge in Low current systems like CCTV/Access Control/intrusion detection systems / X-rays / road blockers, etc.
Ability to work under pressure in a dynamic environment.
Professional presentation skills; self-starter; cooperative attitude; team player.
Highly result orientated with a strong drive to deliver/succeed.
Good organisational and time management skills
Good Computer Knowledge
Fast learner and dedicated.Job Details
